data.title: (Simplified) Ubbi Dubbi decoder
data.statement:
<<Ubbi Dubbi>> is a language game in which "{{ub}}" is inserted before each vowel sound in a syllable.
For this puzzle, we will assume "{{ub}}" is inserted before any vowel group (with a vowel being any character in {{aeiouAEIOU}}).
If the first vowel of a group is uppercase, then we insert "{{Ub}}" (instead of "{{ub}}") and replace that vowel by its lowercase version.

Examples:

"I am Emma" ▶ "Ubi ubam Ubemmuba"
"Good day" ▶ "Gubood dubay"
"Hello" ▶ "Hubellubo"

In this puzzle, you will be given a simplified Ubbi Dubbi sentence, and output the decoded sentence.

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
47
Wube wubant tubo gubet thuberube ubon tubimube!
testCases.testOut: We want to get there on time!

testCases.title: Long sentence
testCases.testIn:
94
Uball hubumuban bubeings ubarube buborn frubee uband ubequbual ubin dubignubity uband rubights
testCases.testOut: All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:
168
Thubey ubarube ubendubowubed wubith rubeasubon uband cubonscubiencube uband shubould ubact tubowubards ubonube ubanubothuber ubin uba spubirubit ubof brubothuberhubood.
testCases.testOut: They are endowed with reason and conscience and should act towards one another in a spirit of brotherhood.

testCases.title: Ubu
testCases.testIn:
99
Subububurbuban, tubububulubifuborm uband subuccubububus ubarube wubords wubith "ubububu" ubin ubit.
testCases.testOut: Suburban, tubuliform and succubus are words with "ubu" in it.

testCases.title: Bubble
testCases.testIn:
118
Bububblube, sububcuboat, sububdubecubimubal, sububfluboor uband sububgruboup hubavube subomubethubing ubin cubommubon.
testCases.testOut: Bubble, subcoat, subdecimal, subfloor and subgroup have something in common.

data.stubGenerator:
read length:int
read sentence:string(length)

write translation
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[length]] length of the sentence.
<<Line 2:>> A string [[sentence]] to be decoded.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Ubbi Dubbi is a language game in which "ub" is inserted before each vowel sound in a syllable.
For this puzzle, we will assume "ub" is inserted before any vowel group (with a vowel being any character in aeiouAEIOU).
If the first vowel of a group is uppercase, then we insert "Ub" (instead of "ub") and replace that vowel by its lowercase version.

Examples:

"I am Emma" ▶ "Ubi ubam Ubemmuba"
"Good day" ▶ "Gubood dubay"
"Hello" ▶ "Hubellubo"

In this puzzle, you will be given a simplified Ubbi Dubbi sentence, and output the decoded sentence.
Input
Line 1: An integer length length of the sentence.
Line 2: A string sentence to be decoded.
Output
The simplified Ubbi Dubbi-decoded sentence.
Constraints
length < 250
Example
Input
18
Hubellubo Wuborld!
Output
Hello World!
